Here's the result of running `cat -n` on /workspace/aws-cloudformation__cfn-lint__d598742504a6a6af0e5d882b6876f2f30007b851/pyproject.toml:
     1	[build-system]
     2	requires = [
     3	  "setuptools >= 65.5.1",
     4	]
     5	build-backend = "setuptools.build_meta"
     6	
     7	[tool.setuptools.packages.find]
     8	where = ["src"]
     9	
    10	[tool.setuptools.dynamic]
    11	version = {attr = "cfnlint.version.__version__"}
    12	readme = {file = ["README.md"], content-type = "text/markdown"}
    13	
    14	[project]
    15	name = "cfn-lint"
    16	description = "Checks CloudFormation templates for practices and behaviour that could potentially be improved"
    17	requires-python = ">=3.8"
    18	license = {text = "MIT no attribution"}
    19	keywords = ["aws", "cloudformation", "lint"]
    20	authors = [
    21	  {email = "kddejong@amazon.com"},
    22	  {name = "Kevin DeJong"},
    23	]
    24	classifiers = [
    25	    "Development Status :: 5 - Production/Stable",
    26	    "Intended Audience :: Developers",
    27	    "License :: OSI Approved :: MIT License",
    28	    "Natural Language :: English",
    29	    "Operating System :: OS Independent",
    30	    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3",
    31	    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.8",
    32	    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.9",
    33	    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.10",
    34	    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.11",
    35	    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.12",
    36	]
    37	dynamic = ["version", "readme"]
    38	dependencies = [
    39	    "pyyaml>5.4",
    40	    "aws-sam-translator>=1.89.0",
    41	    "jsonpatch",
    42	    "networkx>=2.4,<4",
    43	    "sympy>=1.0.0",
    44	    "regex",
    45	    "typing_extensions",
    46	]
    47	
    48	[project.optional-dependencies]
    49	graph = [
    50	    "pydot"
    51	]
    52	junit = [
    53	    "junit-xml~=1.9"
    54	]
    55	sarif = [
    56	    "jschema_to_python~=1.2.3",
    57	    "sarif-om~=1.0.4",
    58	]
    59	full = [
    60	    "junit-xml~=1.9",
    61	    "jschema_to_python~=1.2.3",
    62	    "sarif-om~=1.0.4",
    63	    "pydot"
    64	]
    65	
    66	[project.scripts]
    67	cfn-lint = "cfnlint.runner:main"
    68	
    69	[tool.setuptools.package-data]
    70	cfnlint = ["data/**/*.json"]
    71	
    72	[project.urls]
    73	Homepage = "https://github.com/aws-cloudformation/cfn-lint"
    74	Documentation = "https://github.com/aws-cloudformation/cfn-lint"
    75	Issues = "https://github.com/aws-cloudformation/cfn-lint/issues"
    76	Changelog = "https://github.com/aws-cloudformation/cfn-lint/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md"
    77	Source = "https://github.com/aws-cloudformation/cfn-lint"
    78	
    79	[tool.isort]
    80	profile = "black"
    81	
    82	[tool.black]
    83	skip-string-normalization = false
    84	line-length = 88
    85	
    86	[tool.bandit]
    87	skips = ["B101", "B303", "B310", "B110", "B112", "B324", "B404", "B603", "B607"]
    88	exclude_dirs = ["tests", "scripts"]
    89	
    90	[tool.ruff]
    91	# Enable pycodestyle (`E`) and Pyflakes (`F`) codes by default.
    92	lint.select = ["E", "F"]
    93	lint.ignore = []
    94	
    95	# Allow autofix for all enabled rules (when `--fix`) is provided.
    96	lint.fixable = ["A", "B", "C", "D", "E", "F", "G", "I", "N", "Q", "S", "T", "W", "ANN", "ARG", "BLE", "COM", "DJ", "DTZ", "EM", "ERA", "EXE", "FBT", "ICN", "INP", "ISC", "NPY", "PD", "PGH", "PIE", "PL", "PT", "PTH", "PYI", "RET", "RSE", "RUF", "SIM", "SLF", "TCH", "TID", "TRY", "UP", "YTT"]
    97	lint.unfixable = []
    98	
    99	# Exclude a variety of commonly ignored directories.
   100	exclude = [
   101	    ".bzr",
   102	    ".direnv",
   103	    ".eggs",
   104	    ".git",
   105	    ".git-rewrite",
   106	    ".hg",
   107	    ".mypy_cache",
   108	    ".nox",
   109	    ".pants.d",
   110	    ".pytype",
   111	    ".ruff_cache",
   112	    ".svn",
   113	    ".tox",
   114	    ".venv",
   115	    "__pypackages__",
   116	    "_build",
   117	    "buck-out",
   118	    "build",
   119	    "dist",
   120	    "node_modules",
   121	    "venv",
   122	]
   123	# Same as Black.
   124	line-length = 88
   125	
   126	[tool.ruff.lint.per-file-ignores]
   127	"__init__.py" = ["F401"]
   128	
   129	[tool.pytest.ini_options]
   130	addopts = [
   131	  "-m not data"
   132	]
   133	markers = [
   134	  "data: marks tests as slow (deselect with '-m \"not data\"')",
   135	]
   136	testpaths = [
   137	    "test",
   138	]
   139	
   140	[tool.coverage.run]
   141	branch = true
   142	source = [
   143	  "src/cfnlint"
   144	]
   145	
   146	[tool.coverage.report]
   147	skip_empty = true
   148	skip_covered = true
   149	show_missing = true
   150	sort = "Cover"
   151	exclude_lines = [
   152	  "pragma: no cover",
   153	  "if TYPE_CHECKING:"
   154	]
   155	
   156	[tool.mypy]
   157	python_version = "3.10"
   158	warn_return_any = true
   159	warn_unused_configs = true
   160	files = [
   161	  "src/cfnlint/**/*.py"
   162	]
   163	exclude = [
   164	  "src/cfnlint/data/"
   165	]
   166	
   167	# Per-module options:
   168	[[tool.mypy.overrides]]
   169	module = "networkx.*"
   170	ignore_missing_imports = true
   171	
   172	[[tool.mypy.overrides]]
   173	module = "pydot.*"
   174	ignore_missing_imports = true
   175	
   176	[[tool.mypy.overrides]]
   177	module = "pygraphviz.*"
   178	ignore_missing_imports = true
   179	
   180	[[tool.mypy.overrides]]
   181	module = "importlib_resources.*"
   182	ignore_missing_imports = true
   183	
   184	[[tool.mypy.overrides]]
   185	module = "samtranslator.*"
   186	ignore_missing_imports = true
   187	
   188	[[tool.mypy.overrides]]
   189	module = "sarif_om.*"
   190	ignore_missing_imports = true
   191	
   192	[[tool.mypy.overrides]]
   193	module = "jschema_to_python.*"
   194	ignore_missing_imports = true
   195	
   196	[[tool.mypy.overrides]]
   197	module = "junit_xml.*"
   198	ignore_missing_imports = true
   199	
   200	[[tool.mypy.overrides]]
   201	module = "jsonpatch.*"
   202	ignore_missing_imports = true
   203	
   204	[[tool.mypy.overrides]]
   205	module = "urllib2.*"
   206	ignore_missing_imports = true
   207	
   208	[[tool.mypy.overrides]]
   209	module = "json.*"
   210	ignore_missing_imports = true
